MdToFb.title: Facebook Post Formatter
MdToFb.subtitle: Generate bold text, italic & special fonts for Facebook ‚Äî preserves line breaks, one-click copy
MdToFb.hint: Bold works on English only (A-Z, 0-9). Chinese characters will remain unchanged.

steps.step1Desc: Type text or paste Markdown in the left editor panel. Supports bold, italic, strikethrough, headings, lists, and quotes.
steps.step2Desc: Click the Copy button and paste the formatted text into your Facebook post. Done!

faqs.q1: Can you use bold or special fonts in Facebook posts?
faqs.a1: Facebook doesn't support native rich-text formatting in regular posts. However, Unicode special characters can simulate bold, italic, strikethrough, and monospace effects. This tool automatically converts your text into these special fonts. It supports Markdown syntax and also accepts plain text.
faqs.q2: Why don't Chinese characters show bold, italic, or other effects?
faqs.a2: Unicode special fonts (bold, italic, strikethrough, monospace) only cover Latin letters (A-Z, a-z) and digits (0-9). Chinese, Japanese, and Korean characters have no Unicode styled variants, so they remain unchanged. This is a limitation of the Unicode standard, not the tool.
faqs.a3: This tool supports headings (#), bold (**text**), italic (*text*), strikethrough (~~text~~), inline code (`code`), unordered lists (- item), ordered lists (1. item), and horizontal rules (---). It also automatically preserves line breaks and spacing. You can optionally enable automatic spacing between Chinese and English text.
faqs.q4: Can I format AI-generated text for Facebook?
faqs.a4: Yes. Text from AI tools like ChatGPT and Claude is typically in Markdown format (e.g. **bold**, - lists). Simply paste it into this tool to automatically convert it into Facebook-ready formatting ‚Äî no need to manually remove asterisks or other markup.
faqs.q5: How do I change the font in FB posts?
faqs.a5: Facebook doesn‚Äôt support custom fonts natively, but Unicode special characters can simulate bold, italic, and other effects. Use this tool or pair it with the Special Font Generator to convert text into multiple FB font styles.
faqs.q6: Why do line breaks disappear in Facebook posts?
faqs.a6: Facebook automatically strips extra blank lines. This tool inserts zero-width space characters to preserve your paragraph spacing and line breaks in FB posts ‚Äî no manual workaround needed.
faqs.q7: Does this tool work for Instagram formatting?
faqs.a7: Yes. The bold, italic, and special fonts generated by this tool display correctly in Instagram posts, stories, and bios. Line breaks and paragraph spacing are also preserved when pasting to Instagram.
faqs.q8: How do I make bold text on Facebook?
faqs.a8: Facebook doesn‚Äôt support native bold formatting in regular posts. However, you can use Unicode bold characters to create visually bold text. This Facebook bold text generator automatically converts **bold** Markdown syntax into Unicode bold characters that display correctly in Facebook posts, comments, and bios.
faqs.q9: What text formatting options work on Facebook?
faqs.a9: Standard Facebook posts don‚Äôt support rich text formatting natively. This Facebook text formatting tool lets you simulate bold, italic, strikethrough, and monospace styles using Unicode special characters. It also preserves line breaks and paragraph spacing that Facebook normally removes. Paste Markdown or AI-generated text and get clean, formatted output.

FontGenerator.title: Italic Text Generator & Font Changer
FontGenerator.subtitle: Free italic text generator, bold text, and fancy fonts ‚Äî 15 styles, one-click copy to Facebook, IG, LINE
FontGenerator.hint: English letters and digits will be converted. Chinese stays unchanged.
FontGenerator.hintMixed: Chinese characters cannot be converted to special fonts (Unicode limitation). English letters and digits will convert normally.
FontGenerator.hintAllCjk: Your input is all Chinese. Add English letters or digits to see the conversion.
FontGenerator.tip: Best used sparingly ‚Äî full fancy text is hard to read on mobile.
FontGenerator.whatIsContent: Special fonts use Unicode Mathematical Alphanumeric Symbols to transform regular English letters and digits into aesthetic styled text like bold (ùóïùóºùóπùóÆ), script (ùì¢ùì¨ùì†ùì≤ùóªùòÅ), and double-struck (ùïÜùòÇùòÅùóπùó∂ùóªùóÆ). This aesthetic font generator lets you copy and paste directly to Instagram, Facebook, LINE, and other social platforms ‚Äî no font installation or app required.
FontGenerator.platformsTitle: Where Can You Use Special Fonts?
FontGenerator.platformsSummary: Posts, stories, bios, messages, nicknames ‚Äî works on any platform that supports Unicode.
FontGenerator.vsFontDesc: Transform letters into different visual styles. Still searchable and copyable as text.
FontGenerator.vsSymbolDesc: Standalone graphic characters for decoration. Cannot be converted from text.
FontGenerator.vsSummary: Both work on social platforms. Combine them for the best effect.
FontGenerator.howToUseTitle: How to Use the Special Font Generator?

steps.step1Desc: Type the text you want to convert in the input field above. Supports mixed English, numbers, and Chinese.
steps.step2Desc: Click the Copy button next to your favorite font style, then paste it into IG, FB, LINE, or any social platform.

faqs.q1: Where can I use special fonts?
faqs.a1: You can use them on Facebook posts, Instagram bio and stories, Twitter/X, LINE messages, Discord, and all platforms that support Unicode.
faqs.a2: Special fonts use Unicode Mathematical Alphanumeric Symbols, which only cover English letters (A-Z) and digits (0-9). Chinese characters remain unchanged. Works best when combined with English.
faqs.q3: How do I make Facebook bold text?
faqs.a3: Facebook doesn't support native bold formatting, but this Facebook font generator uses Unicode to create bold text for Facebook posts. Just type your text, pick Bold style, and copy-paste.
faqs.q4: Do special fonts display on mobile?
faqs.a4: Most special fonts display correctly on iOS and Android. Some rare fonts may appear as boxes on certain devices. Test before posting.
faqs.q5: Do special fonts affect SEO or search rankings?
faqs.a5: Unicode special fonts cannot be properly indexed by search engines. They should only be used for social media decoration, not website body text.
faqs.q6: How do I generate italic text for social media?
faqs.a6: Use this italic text generator to convert your text instantly. Type your text, select the Italic or Bold Italic style, click Copy, then paste into Instagram Stories, Facebook, or any platform.
faqs.q7: Can I use this as a Facebook font generator?
faqs.a7: Yes! This works as a Facebook font generator with bold, italic, script, and 12 other styles. Generate fancy text for your Facebook posts, Instagram bio, or LINE messages ‚Äî all free, no app needed.
faqs.a8: Circled (‚í∏‚ìò‚ì°‚ìí‚ìõ‚ìî‚ìì) and Parenthesized (‚íî‚íû‚í£‚ìî) are the most popular cute styles. Type your text, copy, and paste into your social posts.
faqs.q9: What special English font styles are available?
faqs.a9: This tool offers 15 styles: Bold, Italic, Bold Italic, Bold Script, Script, Fraktur, Double-Struck, Circled, Squared, Parenthesized, Upside Down, Strikethrough, Underline, Fullwidth, and Small Caps. All with instant preview and one-click copy.

ImageCompress.title: Online Image Compressor
ImageCompress.subtitle: Free JPG, PNG, WebP compression ‚Äî reduce file size while keeping quality
ImageCompress.uploadLabel: Click or drag & drop to upload
ImageCompress.uploadHint: Supports JPG, PNG, WebP up to 15MB
ImageCompress.warmingUp: Server is warming up, please wait...
ImageCompress.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

steps.step1Desc: Click the upload area or drag & drop your image. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.
steps.step2Desc: Select Small File, Balanced, or High Quality mode based on your needs.
steps.step3Desc: Review the file size reduction and download your compressed image with one click.

faqs.a1: In High Quality mode, the quality loss is virtually invisible. Balanced mode offers the best trade-off between file size and quality for most use cases.
faqs.a2: We support JPEG (JPG), PNG, and WebP. When you compress PNG images, they are automatically converted to a smaller lossy format for maximum file size reduction.
faqs.q3: Where can I use compressed images?
faqs.a3: Compressed images are perfect for website uploads, social media posts, email attachments, and blog articles. Smaller files mean faster page loading.
faqs.q4: Can I reduce image size to a specific KB?
faqs.a4: Yes. Choose the quality level to reduce image size in KB ‚Äî Small File mode can compress an image to under 100KB. You can also set max width/height to resize. Maximum upload size is 15MB.
faqs.q5: Are uploaded images stored on your server?
faqs.a5: No. All images are deleted immediately after processing. We do not store any of your uploaded images.

steps.step2Desc: AI automatically detects people and objects, precisely removing the background.
steps.step3Desc: Preview the result and download your transparent PNG with one click.

faqs.q1: How good is the AI background removal?
faqs.a1: AI precisely detects people, animals, and objects, automatically removing the background. It works best with images that have clear edges and a distinct subject.
faqs.a2: The output is always a PNG with a transparent background. You can use it directly in designs, presentations, or social media posts.
faqs.q3: What can I use it for?
faqs.a3: Perfect for e-commerce product photos, ID photos, social media content, and presentation graphics. After background removal, you can change photo background to any color or scene for free.
faqs.a4: Most images are processed in 3-10 seconds. The first request may take up to 30 seconds while the AI model loads.
faqs.a5: No. All images are deleted from the server immediately after processing. We do not store any uploaded images.

VideoCompress.title: Online Video Compressor
VideoCompress.subtitle: Free online video compression ‚Äî works on iPhone, Android & desktop, no app needed
VideoCompress.uploadLabel: Click or drag & drop to upload
VideoCompress.uploadHint: Supports MP4, MOV, WebM up to 100MB
VideoCompress.warmingUp: Server is warming up, please wait...
VideoCompress.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

steps.step1Desc: Click the upload area or drag & drop your video file. Supports MP4, MOV, WebM up to 100MB.
steps.step2Desc: Select compression quality and max resolution. Balanced mode works best for most cases.
steps.step3Desc: Review the file size reduction and download your compressed video with one click.

faqs.a1: In High Quality mode, quality loss is virtually invisible. Balanced mode offers the best trade-off. Small File mode has the highest compression but some visible quality reduction.
faqs.a2: We support MP4, MOV (QuickTime), and WebM. Output is always MP4 for maximum compatibility.
faqs.q3: Where can I use compressed videos?
faqs.a3: Perfect for sharing via LINE, Instagram Stories, email attachments, and website uploads. The MP4 output works on all platforms.
faqs.q4: What is the maximum upload size?
faqs.a4: Each video can be up to 100MB. Processing time varies based on video length and resolution.
faqs.a5: No. All videos are deleted from the server immediately after compression. We do not store any uploaded videos.
faqs.q6: Can I compress videos on iPhone or Android?
faqs.a6: Yes! Open this page in your phone's browser (Safari, Chrome), select a video from your camera roll, and compress it directly online. No app installation needed.
faqs.q7: How do I compress a video to the smallest size?
faqs.a7: Choose Small File quality with 480p resolution for maximum compression. A 100MB video can typically be reduced to 10-30% of its original size.
faqs.q8: Do I need to install anything?
faqs.a8: No installation required. This is a browser-based online video compressor that works on any device ‚Äî desktop, phone, or tablet. Just open the page and start compressing.

VideoToGif.title: Online Video to GIF Converter
VideoToGif.subtitle: Free online GIF maker ‚Äî convert videos to GIFs on any device, no app needed
VideoToGif.uploadLabel: Click or drag & drop to upload
VideoToGif.uploadHint: Supports MP4, MOV, WebM up to 100MB
VideoToGif.warmingUp: Server is warming up, please wait...
VideoToGif.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
VideoToGif.howToUseTitle: How to Convert Video to GIF?

steps.step1Desc: Click the upload area or drag & drop your video file. Supports MP4, MOV, and WebM.
steps.step2Desc: Choose frame rate (FPS) and GIF width. Lower FPS and smaller width produce smaller GIF files.
steps.step3Desc: Preview the result and download your animated GIF with one click.

faqs.q1: What's the difference between GIF and video?
faqs.a1: GIF is an animated image format that auto-loops without a player. Great for chat reactions, tutorials, and social posts. However, GIFs don't support audio and are usually larger than videos.
faqs.q2: How can I make the GIF file smaller?
faqs.a2: Lower the FPS (5-10) and GIF width (320px) to significantly reduce file size. Shorter video clips also produce smaller GIFs.
faqs.a3: GIFs work everywhere: LINE, Slack, Discord, email, websites, social media. They're the most universal format for sharing animated content.
faqs.q4: What video length works best for GIFs?
faqs.a4: 5-15 second clips work best. Videos over 30 seconds create very large GIFs ‚Äî consider sharing as video instead.
faqs.a5: No. All videos are deleted from the server immediately after conversion. We do not store any uploaded videos.
faqs.q6: Can I convert videos to GIF on iPhone or Android?
faqs.a6: Yes! Open this page in your phone's browser (Safari, Chrome), select a video from your camera roll, and convert it to GIF directly online. No app installation needed.
faqs.q7: How do I make a high-quality GIF from a video?
faqs.a7: This tool uses palette optimization for the best color quality. Choose a higher FPS (15-20) and larger width (640px) for sharper GIFs. Note that GIF format supports only 256 colors, so some color difference from the original video is expected.
faqs.q8: Do I need to install any software?
faqs.a8: No installation required. This is a browser-based online GIF maker that works on any device ‚Äî desktop, phone, or tablet. Just open the page and start converting.

faqs.a1: Any YouTube video with subtitles is supported, regardless of the original language. The summary is generated in Traditional Chinese.
faqs.a2: The AI summary is based on the video's subtitle content. Accuracy depends on subtitle quality. Verify important information with the original video.
faqs.q3: How many times can I use it per day?
faqs.a3: Free users can use it several times per day. After that, complete a simple verification to continue.
faqs.q4: What can I use it for?
faqs.a4: Great for quickly understanding video content, study notes, meeting summaries, or sharing key points with others.
faqs.q5: Is there a video length limit?
faqs.a5: Videos under 60 minutes are recommended. Longer videos may affect summary quality due to transcript length.
